g.text: 2. Shares the doc with relevant ppl
Shares the doc with close colleagues
Shares the doc with impacted ppl from other teams
3. Iterates to resolve the remaining comments
Schedules a meeting focused on a comment
Creates a "Notes" section to doc discussion
Sends a follow-up with key discussion points and resolutions
Incorporates the outcomes of the discussion
Follows up and closes comment threads
